colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (CES PA 'DI NI BSTAN 'DZIN SKYES CHEN DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS PAD BRTAN CAN MDZAD PA'I 'PHRIN RGYAS PA DANG, 'DAS GSON SER SKYA 'BREL THOGS TSAD RNAMS KYI DON DANG, BDAG GI 'DI PHYI'I CHOS LDAN BSAM DON GRUB CHED DU DMIGS NAS RBGYAD STONG PA DANG BZANG SKYONG SMON LAM SOGS KHA 'DON BYED PA'I MJUG TU BTON RGYUR ^ BIKshU KYI NA BA ZHIG GIS PHAL CHER TSAD LDAN SKYES CHEN DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG BYIN RLABS CAN RNAMS LAS BTUS TE BKOD PA LAGS, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
